info.name: Liar's Dice
info.attribution:
The game design and all game board elements are by RaphaelAlvez and are released to the Public Domain by CC0.

The library image is from https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Liar%27s_dice#/media/File:Perudo.jpg and is available under CC BY 2.0.
info.description: Make claims about value of rolled dice to bluff opponents and get them to challenge.  Lose dice if caught in a lie.  Last player with dice wins.
